<script>
// Network Graph Animation
const canvas = document.getElementById('networkCanvas');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

function resizeCanvas() {
  canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
  canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
}
resizeCanvas();
window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);

class Node {
  constructor(x, y) {
    this.x = x;
    this.y = y;
    this.vx = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.5;
    this.vy = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.5;
    this.radius = 3;
  }

  update() {
    this.x += this.vx;
    this.y += this.vy;

    if (this.x < 0 || this.x > canvas.width) this.vx *= -1;
    if (this.y < 0 || this.y > canvas.height) this.vy *= -1;
  }

  draw() {
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.radius, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(100, 149, 237, 0.5)';
    ctx.fill();
  }
}

const nodes = [];
const nodeCount = 50;

for (let i = 0; i < nodeCount; i++) {
  nodes.push(new Node(
    Math.random() * canvas.width,
    Math.random() * canvas.height
  ));
}

function drawConnections() {
  for (let i = 0; i < nodes.length; i++) {
    for (let j = i + 1; j < nodes.length; j++) {
      const dx = nodes[i].x - nodes[j].x;
      const dy = nodes[i].y - nodes[j].y;
      const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);

      if (distance < 150) {
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.moveTo(nodes[i].x, nodes[i].y);
        ctx.lineTo(nodes[j].x, nodes[j].y);
        ctx.strokeStyle = `rgba(100, 149, 237, ${0.2 * (1 - distance / 150)})`;
        ctx.lineWidth = 1;
        ctx.stroke();
      }
    }
  }
}

function animate() {
  ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
  
  drawConnections();
  
  nodes.forEach(node => {
    node.update();
    node.draw();
  });

  requestAnimationFrame(animate);
}

animate();

// Load Latest Posts
fetch('/search.json')
  .then(response => response.json())
  .then(data => {
    const postsContainer = document.getElementById('latest-posts-container');
    postsContainer.innerHTML = '';
    
    // Filter blog posts only (exclude other pages)
    const blogPosts = data.filter(item => 
      item.href && 
      item.href.includes('/blog/posts/') && 
      !item.href.includes('PACKAGE_REQUIREMENTS') &&
      item.section === "" // Only get main page entries, not subsections
    ).slice(0, 6);
    
    if (blogPosts.length === 0) {
      postsContainer.innerHTML = '<p class="no-posts">No posts available yet.</p>';
      return;
    }
    
    blogPosts.forEach((post, index) => {
      const postCard = document.createElement('div');
      postCard.className = 'post-card';
      postCard.style.animationDelay = `${index * 0.1}s`;
      
      // Extract a brief description from text (first 150 chars)
      const description = post.text ? post.text.substring(0, 150) + '...' : '';
      
      postCard.innerHTML = `
        <a href="/${post.href}" class="post-link">
          <div class="post-icon">
            <i class="bi bi-file-text"></i>
          </div>
          <h3 class="post-title">${post.title || 'Untitled'}</h3>
          ${description ? `<p class="post-description">${description}</p>` : ''}
        </a>
      `;
      
      postsContainer.appendChild(postCard);
    });
  })
  .catch(error => {
    console.error('Error loading posts:', error);
    document.getElementById('latest-posts-container').innerHTML = 
      '<p class="no-posts">Unable to load posts.</p>';
  });
</script>
